job.title: DATA ENGINEER

PythonppbrppStrong grasp of statistics and experience conducting rigorous data analysesppbrppExperience developing models and visualizations including ExcelppbrppstrongUseful for you to havestrongppbrppThe capacity to juggle multiple priorities effectively within a fastpaced environment criticalppbrppBenbspa highly motivated selfstarter with the ability to execute plans independently importantppbrppBe able to learn new datarelated tools and technologies to maintain and improve the overallnbspppdata management and BI strategyppbrppBe passionate about spreading the value of data throughout the companyppbrppCommunicate insights to a broad audience with varying levels of technical expertiseppbrppstrongWhy work at CNW GlobalstrongppbrppWe are a fast moving funloving passionate group of people who really care about solving expedited air logistics emergencies for our customers We worknbspuforunbspthemnbspWe empower our employees to drive our business and to suggest changes when we dont get it right These are our valuesppExceed Customer Expectations we provide an exceptional experience on each and every challengeppTake Ownership we are trusted to make decisions that are in the best interests of our customers We think and act like owners We care and are agile and that makes all the difference in the worldppBe Curious We are curious ask questions seek to understand and
